title: map_to_base
description: Maps an image or surface from a time point directory (either cross-sectional or longitudinal) to the base space and outputs it in the appropriate base directory.

tpid.title: Time Point ID
tpid.description: Identifier of the time point, without the '.long.baseid' suffix.

input_image.title: Input Image
input_image.description: Input image, e.g., norm.mgz, aseg.mgz, lh.white.

resample_type.title: Resample Type
resample_type.description: Resample type. 'interpolate' for norm, T1, orig; 'nearest' for aseg; 'surface' for surfaces.

cross.title: Cross Sectional Flag
cross.description: If '1', input is from cross sectionals; default is to use longitudinal directories.
